MonsterTrait.Name: Additional Legs
MonsterTrait.Text: Four legs allow the clockwork abomination to climb at a speed equal to its base speed and to ignore difficult terrain.

MonsterTrait.Name: Piston Reach
MonsterTrait.Text: The abomination's melee attacks have a deceptively long reach thanks to the pistons powering them.

MonsterTrait.Name: Immutable Form
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork abomination is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

MonsterTrait.Name: Infernal Power Source
MonsterTrait.Text: When a clockwork abomination falls to 0 hp, its infernal battery explodes. Creatures within 10 feet of the clockwork abomination take 14 (4d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 14 Dexterity saving throw.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork abomination makes one bite attack and one slam attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Slam
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The clockwork abomination's Infernal Power Source allows it to breathe fire in a 20-foot cone. Targets in this cone take 22 (4d10) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 14 Dexterity saving throw.
